769570.name: Toy Clash: Commander of Toys
769570.description: The real commander reads the tide of the battlefield and wins the battle with a minimal damage. The situations of eight stages included in this free DLC will vary greatly depending on how you concentrate are and how you make decisions. If your battle time takes too long or if you toys are getting hurt with cumulative damage, try using a new strategy!
769570.supported_languages: 英语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语, 韩语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 简体中文, 繁体中文
